features: LOOK AND FEEL RELAXED in your new Hi-Lo Cardi
BEAUTIFUL WIDE NECKLINE detail, exposed center back seam and pockets

FEEL COMFORTABLE and look stylish. An everyday favorite, makes any outfit, greater
description: Barefoot Dreams CozyChic Ultra Lite Hi-Lo Cardi
Look and feel relaxed in your new Hi-Lo Cardi. Beautiful, wide neckline detail, exposed center back seam and pockets. The rolled hem and ample wrap coverage make this style a wardrobe favorite.
Ideal for travels, while relaxing or lounging
